subTasks.description: Choose a suitable template or design layout
Create a color scheme and select appropriate fonts
Design the logo and other visual elements
Create a home page with a clear navigation menu
Design individual web pages for different sections or features of the website
Implement appropriate buttons, links, and forms for user interaction
Select an API or library to integrate ChatGpt with the website
Configure the ChatGpt to handle user queries and generate responses
Implement a user interface for the chatbot to appear on the website
Conduct thorough testing to ensure all website functionalities work correctly
Identify and fix any bugs or issues in the website's code or design
Test the ChatGpt integration for smooth conversation flow and accuracy
Choose a suitable web hosting provider to deploy the website
Configure the website to be accessible online
Regularly update and maintain the website to ensure compatibility and security.
